32. There can be no dispute about the third category of contracts, which are not contracts in real sense and where there is a direct relationship between the employer and workmen. In respect of first category of contracts, there is absolutely no employer-employee relationship between the parties and in such cases for establishment such relationship, a declaration of contract being sham and bogus becomes necessary.
